BlackCave.text: In the darkness you happen upon the remains of a previous spelunker. Make a Luck(0) check and consult the chart below: Successes: 0) The body begins to bloat and splits open, releasing the horror within. Lose 1 Sanity and a monster appears! 1) The body has been ripped apart as if shredded by a powerful monster. Lose 1 Sanity. 2+) Searching the body you find something interesting. Draw 1 Common Item.

GeneralStore.text: Noticing a glint on the floor, you discover a silver dollar someone must have dropped. Gain $1.
